description.narrative: IR3.1 Increasing per cent with improved retention and completion rates (at least 80 per cent grade by grade promotion) of especially girls and vulnerable children in UNICEF assisted schools by end 2012. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Component Results (PCR) 3 Education systems are equipped with capacity to provide for equitable access to pre and primary education services particularly for girls an vulnerable groups by end 2012.
